content: You nailed it; and the reason I know this is because as soon as I read it I thoughts, “OMG! That’s me in my profession!” This simple, yet profound revelation has caused me to sit down in the theater of my mind and watch ALL.THE.WAYS my stove-piping has stymied my professional development as well as hindered my orgainzation’s growth. Looks like I have some introspection to do.
